page.title: 10CLUBS IN GILWERN 1
page.content: There are many varied clubs and societies in Gilwern.The following are open to 8_16 year olds. BROWNIES_There are 2 packs of Brownies in Gilwern,that meet on Mondays and Tuesdays.In their seperate groups they work towards badges and play games. GUIDES_The Guides meet on Fridays at our school.In Guides the girls work in patrols for badges,play games and in the Summer go camping. CUBS_The Cubs meet on Mondays at the Village Hall.They play games,try to earn badges for themselves and go camping in the Summer. SCOUTS_The Scouts meet at Mr. Jones's house on Friday evenings.Their activities are very similar to those of the Cubs,but more advanced.
